body: When going to make a guild the app automatically turns on light mode on mobile. It sucks when it's late at night and you get your eyes burned because of it.
body_html: When going to make a guild the app automatically turns on light mode on mobile. It sucks when it's late at night and you get your eyes burned because of it.
